mapper.select:
select * from org_organ t where billdate = ${day} and status = 1
and billtype = '0'

select IFNULL(SUM(case org_order.orderstatus when '7' then org_order.orderamount when '8' then IFNULL(org_ordercancel.cancelamount,0) end),0) as orderAmount from org_order left join org_ordercancel on (org_ordercancel.orderno = org_order.orderno and org_ordercancel.status = 1 and org_order.expensetype = 2) where org_order.companyid = #{leasesCompanyId} and org_order.usetype = 0 and org_order.paymethod = 2 and org_order.status = 1 and (org_order.orderstatus = 7 or (org_order.orderstatus = 8 and org_ordercancel.cancelnature = 1)) and org_order.paymentstatus = 4
and org_order.organid IN ( select organ.id from org_organ organ where organ.status = 1 and organ.creditcode = ( select org_organ.creditcode from org_organ where org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ.id = #{organId} ) )
and org_order.endtime >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and org_order.endtime < STR_TO_DATE(ADDDATE(#{endTime},1),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and org_order.reviewstatus = #{billState}
and (org_order.reviewstatus = 0 or org_order.reviewstatus = 2)
and NOT EXISTS ( select * from (select org_organbilldetails.orderid from org_organbill inner join (select t1.billsid,t1.operationtime,t1.billstate from ( select org_organbillstate.billsid,org_organbillstate.operationtime,org_organbillstate.billstate from org_organbillstate where org_organbillstate.status = 1 order by org_organbillstate.operationtime desc ) t1 group by t1.billsid ) t2 on org_organbill.id = t2.billsid inner join org_organbilldetails on org_organbill.id = org_organbilldetails.billsid where org_organbill.leasescompanyid = #{leasesCompanyId} and org_organbill.status = 1
and org_organbill.organid = #{organId}
and (t2.billstate = 1 or t2.billstate = 2 or t2.billstate = 3 or t2.billstate = 4 or t2.billstate = 5 or t2.billstate = 6) and org_organbilldetails.status = 1) t3 where org_order.orderno = t3.orderid )

select org_order.orderno as orderNo from org_order left join org_ordercancel on (org_ordercancel.orderno = org_order.orderno and org_ordercancel.status = 1 and org_order.expensetype = 2) where org_order.companyid = #{leasesCompanyId} and org_order.usetype = 0 and org_order.paymethod = 2 and org_order.status = 1 and (org_order.orderstatus = 7 or (org_order.orderstatus = 8 and org_ordercancel.cancelnature = 1)) and org_order.paymentstatus = 4
and org_order.organid IN ( select organ.id from org_organ organ where organ.status = 1 and organ.creditcode = ( select org_organ.creditcode from org_organ where org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ.id = #{organId} ) )
and org_order.endtime >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and org_order.endtime < STR_TO_DATE(ADDDATE(#{endTime},1),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and org_order.reviewstatus = #{billState}
and (org_order.reviewstatus = 0 or org_order.reviewstatus = 2)
and NOT EXISTS ( select * from (select org_organbilldetails.orderid from org_organbill inner join (select t1.billsid,t1.operationtime,t1.billstate from ( select org_organbillstate.billsid,org_organbillstate.operationtime,org_organbillstate.billstate from org_organbillstate where org_organbillstate.status = 1 order by org_organbillstate.operationtime desc ) t1 group by t1.billsid ) t2 on org_organbill.id = t2.billsid inner join org_organbilldetails on org_organbill.id = org_organbilldetails.billsid where org_organbill.leasescompanyid = #{leasesCompanyId} and org_organbill.status = 1
and org_organbill.organid = #{organId}
and (t2.billstate = 1 or t2.billstate = 2 or t2.billstate = 3 or t2.billstate = 4 or t2.billstate = 5 or t2.billstate = 6) and org_organbilldetails.status = 1) t3 where org_order.orderno = t3.orderid )
mapper.update: update org_order set paymentstatus = 2,updatetime=now() where orderno = #{orderId} and status = 1
